summary: Young Esteban wants to become a writer and also to discover the identity of his second mother, a trans woman, carefully concealed by his mother Manuela.
cast: Cecilia Roth|Marisa Paredes|Candela Peña|Antonia San Juan|Penélope Cruz|Rosa Maria Sardà|Fernando Fernán Gómez|Toni Cantó|Eloy Azorín|Carlos Lozano|Fernando Guillén|Manuel Morón|José Luis Torrijo|Juan José Otegui|Carmen Balagué|Malena Gutiérrez|Yael Barnatán|Carme Fortuny|Patxi Freytez|Juan Márquez|Michel Ruben|Daniel Lanchas|Rosa Manaut|Carlos García Cambero|Agustín Almodóvar|Paz Sufrategui|Lola García|Esther García|Inma Subirà|Anne Baxter|Bette Davis|Cayetana Guillén Cuervo|Celeste Holm|Alexia Pardo|Lluís Pasqual|Dolors Pozzan|Fito Páez|Thelma Ritter
keywords: actress|writer|single mother|sex talk|reference to a streetcar named desire
title: Todo sobre mi madre
